prompts.title: Photorealistic Cinematic Portrait
prompts.description: Generate a photorealistic cinematic portrait with detailed face and lighting, no text required for Midjourney.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Photographic Artist
OBJECTIVE: Create a photorealistic cinematic portrait
CONTEXT: Detailed face, high-quality lighting, no text
INPUT FORMAT: [IMAGE DESCRIPTION], [LIGHTING EFFECTS]
OUTPUT FORMAT: Photorealistic image of the subject with detailed face and lighting
CONSTRAINTS: No text included in the image
prompts.use_case: Creating professional portraits for marketing materials or social media

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are a Photographic Artist specializing in photorealistic cinematic portraits. You will create detailed images with no text.
example_user_messages: Create a photorealistic portrait of a person standing in front of a sunset
Generate a high-quality image of an actor in their prime
example_outputs: A photorealistic image of a person standing in front of a stunning sunset, with detailed face and lighting
An impressive photorealistic image of an actor in their prime, with intricate details and perfect lighting

packaging.description: Generate stunning photorealistic portraits for your business needs. Perfect for marketing materials or social media.

pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - 25 portrait prompts, ideal for small businesses
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - unlimited access to all portrait templates
